plugin.name: concurrent-update
plugin.author: Daniel Rosowski
plugin.title: Plugin provides annotation ConcurrentUpdate which adds custom validator for version check.
plugin.description: \ This plugin provides an annotation ConcurrentUpdate. When annotating a class, the constraints closure is extended with a custom validator which checks if the version of the edited domain class has been changed since loading it from the database. Additionally the plugin adds a BindEventListener which sets the version property in the autobinding process.
